name: LochNess - The Game
description:
LochNess - The Game

In the great classics, the snake game became a must-have from 1998.
Take a dose of nostalgia and play as the famous loch Ness monster in this snake like!

Slither through the lake to avoid the sea mines among the level.
Eat the curious fishermen and the delicious fish and squid on your way to increase your size, but beware of the fishing boats' eddies!

If you like Lochness, don't hesitate to download our other available games.

Do not hesitate to check out our website to see our other available projects !

www.origaming-studio.com

OriGaming Studio
